name: GunTron
description:
Escape the Room Loops in Guntron. You are in a Dungeon and must escape the rooms.

But which doors is the right one ? Choosing the wrong door (after killing all enemies and collect all stuff) can lead to an room that you already had done.

But there is a hint - if you are fast enough to get it.
Shoot the way through the dungeon and be the fastest.
